name: PM-KISAN e-KYC Mandate
description: eKYC made mandatory for all PM-KISAN registered farmers. OTP-based and Biometric eKYC available through portal and CSC centers to ensure authenticity and prevent fraudulent claims.
benefits: Continued benefit eligibility, prevention of duplicate/fraudulent claims, streamlined verification

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: Income support of ₹6,000 per year to eligible landholding farmer families, paid in 3 equal instalments. Over 10 crore farmers benefited as of 2025.
eligibility: Small and marginal landholding farmer families (subject to exclusion criteria)
benefits: Direct cash transfer of ₹6,000/year in three installments

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance scheme to provide insurance coverage and financial support to farmers in the event of crop failure.
eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Scheme
department: Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare / NABARD
description: Provides short-term credit to farmers for cultivation and allied activities.
benefits: Easy credit, overdraft facility, crop loans

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan MaanDhan Yojana (PM-KMY)
description: Pension scheme for small and marginal farmers; contributory with matching government share.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers aged 18-40 years

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana (PMKSY)
description: 'Per Drop More Crop' — aims to improve irrigation, water use efficiency and expand cultivated area under assured irrigation.
eligibility: Farmers and states implementing irrigation projects

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides soil health cards to farmers advising on nutrient management and fertilizers.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
description: Promotes organic farming through clusters and training.
benefits: Support for organic inputs, premium price potential

name: National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)
description: An electronic trading portal for agricultural commodities to create a unified national market.
benefits: Transparent price discovery, wider market access

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
description: Credit facility for investment in post-harvest infrastructure and community farming assets.

name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
description: Increase production of rice, wheat, pulses, and coarse cereals through area expansion and productivity enhancement.
eligibility: State governments and farmers under mission projects
benefits: Assistance for seeds, fertilizers, crop management practices

name: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization (SMAM)
description: Promotes agricultural mechanization among small and marginal farmers.
benefits: Subsidies for machines and custom hiring centers

name: Soil Health Management (SHM) under NMSA
description: Part of NMSA to improve soil health via liming, gypsum, micro-nutrients and organic matter.
benefits: Technical assistance, inputs for soil improvement

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan (PM-KUSUM)
department: Ministry of New & Renewable Energy / Agriculture
description: Promotes solar power in agriculture through solarization of pumps and decentralised power plants.
benefits: Subsidies for solar pumps, income from power sale

name: National Horticulture Mission (NHM) / Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH)
description: Promotes holistic growth of horticulture sector including production, post-harvest, and marketing.
benefits: Assistance for planting material, post-harvest infrastructure

name: Pradhan Mantri Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PM-FME)
description: Supports micro food processing enterprises with credit, grants and training.
eligibility: Micro food processing units, FPOs, SHGs
benefits: Financial assistance, capacity building, branding support

name: National Beekeeping and Honey Mission (NBHM)
description: Promotes beekeeping and allied activities to enhance farmer incomes and pollination services.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY)
department: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
description: Aims to bring about Blue Revolution through sustainable and responsible development of fisheries.
benefits: Financial assistance for aquaculture infrastructure and technology

name: National Fisheries Development Board (NFDB) schemes
description: Various schemes for fisheries development, including seed production, aquaculture and extension.

name: National Cooperative Development Corporation (NCDC) schemes for agriculture
description: Financing and development support for cooperatives in agriculture and allied sectors.
benefits: Loans, grants for infrastructure and value addition

name: Pradhan Mantri Poshan (Nutrition) related schemes (support for agrifood)
department: Ministry of Women & Child Development / Agriculture linkages
description: Schemes focusing on nutrition security that link farmers to nutrition programs (e.g., procurement of millets, pulses).

name: National Mission on Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
description: Aims for sustainable agriculture through efficient water use, soil management, and climate resilience.
benefits: Support for climate resilient practices, resource conservation

name: Sub-Mission on Agroforestry (SMAF)
description: Promotes agroforestry practices for additional income and ecological benefits.

name: National Food Processing Policy / PM Kisan Sampada Yojana
description: Supports creation of modern food processing infrastructure and value addition.

name: Interest Subvention Scheme for Crop Loans / Modified Interest Subvention
department: Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare / RBI
description: Interest subvention to farmers on short-term crop loans to reduce cost of credit.

name: Farmer Producer Organisations (FPO) Promotion (APEX, SFAC support)
department: Small Farmers Agribusiness Consortium (SFAC) / Ministry of Agriculture
description: Supports formation and strengthening of FPOs for better market access and economies of scale.
benefits: Grants for business plans, equity support, capacity building

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
description: Provides flexibility and funds to states to formulate agricultural development plans.
eligibility: State departments and farmers under projects
benefits: Project funding for state-specific agriculture interventions

name: National Cooperative Development Programme for Farmers
description: Support to cooperative societies for agriculture marketing, processing and infrastructure.

name: On-Farm Water Management (OFWM) - Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana components
description: Supports efficient on-farm water use, micro-irrigation, and water conservation.
benefits: Subsidies for drip and sprinkler systems

name: Soil and Land Use Survey (S&LUS) and Land Records Modernization links
description: Initiatives for better land records and soil mapping to support schemes and eligibility verification.
benefits: Accurate land records for DBT and scheme targeting

name: Integrated Scheme for Agricultural Marketing (ISAM)
description: Supports market infrastructure including rural markets, capacity building and promotion of value chains.
benefits: Funds for market yards, grading, storage and market linkages

name: National Bee-keeping and Honey Mission (repeat as NBHM)
description: (Listed earlier) enhances income through apiculture and pollination services.

name: Sub-Mission on Seed and Planting Material (Seed Village Programme)
description: Ensures availability of quality seeds and planting materials to farmers.
benefits: Assistance for certified seeds, seed production

name: National Mission on Edible Oils – Oil Palm (NMEO-OP)
description: Promotes cultivation of oil palm to increase domestic edible oil production.
benefits: Support for seedlings, inputs, and extension

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) (repeat)
description: (Listed earlier) Blue Revolution-focused fisheries development

name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA) (links to agriculture labour)
description: Provides rural employment and can support agricultural and water conservation works.

name: National Dairy Plan (NDP)
department: NDDB / Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
description: Aims to enhance productivity of milch animals and milk production infrastructure.

name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (repeat NMSA)
description: (Listed earlier) climate resilience and sustainable practices

name: Soil Health Management (repeat)
description: (Listed earlier) soil testing, micro-nutrient management

name: National Seed Plan
description: Schemes to boost seed production and availability.
benefits: Subsidy and support for seed production

name: Per Drop More Crop (Component of PMKSY)
description: Focuses on micro-irrigation to improve water use efficiency.

name: National Mission on Agricultural Extension and Technology (NMAET) / ATMA
description: Strengthens agricultural extension systems via ATMA model at district level.
benefits: Capacity building, extension services to farmers

name: Pradhan Mantri Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PM-FME) (repeat)
description: (Listed earlier) supports micro food processing units

name: National Bamboo Mission
department: Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare / Ministry of Commerce (various)
description: Promotes bamboo cultivation and value chain development.

name: Support to State Extension Programmes for Extension Reforms (ATMA component)
description: Strengthens state extension systems and decentralized extension planning.
benefits: Funds for extension reforms and activities

name: National Mission on Agroforestry (repeat SMAF)
description: (Listed earlier) promotes agroforestry & allied activities
benefits: Support for planting material and technical assistance

name: Rashtriya Gokul Mission (for bovine development)
description: Conservation and development of indigenous bovine breeds.

name: NABARD Farmer Producer Organization (FPO) Support Programmes
description: Financial and capacity support for FPO formation and strengthening.

name: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (repeat MIDH)
description: (Listed earlier) supports horticulture production and post-harvest management
benefits: Assistance for production, processing and marketing

name: National Agricultural Insurance Scheme (various state & central schemes)
description: Crop and allied sector insurance schemes including PMFBY and state variants.

name: Digital Agriculture Mission / e-Platforms (e.g., Agmarknet, eNAM)
description: Digital platforms for market intelligence, price discovery and extension services.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Sampada Yojana (value chain schemes)
description: Build integrated cold chains and processing facilities to reduce wastage and add value.
benefits: Grant-in-aid for processing and marketing infrastructure

name: Cluster Development Programme for Horticulture & Crops (state & central schemes)
description: Cluster-based development for crops/horticulture including infrastructure, training and market linkages.

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
description: Medium-to-long-term debt financing for post-harvest and community farming assets.
benefits: Loans with interest subvention & credit guarantee

name: National Mission on Edible Oils – Oil Palm (NMEO-OP)
description: Promote oil-palm cultivation in NE states and Andaman & Nicobar.

name: Digital Agriculture Mission
description: Agri digital infrastructure (AgriStack, DSS, crop survey).
benefits: Digital IDs, decision-support, better resource use

name: Mission for Natural Farming
description: Scale up natural/organic farming.

name: Pradhan Mantri Dhan-Dhaanya Krishi Yojana
description: Enhance productivity, irrigation, value-chain in 100 districts.

name: Dalhan Atmanirbharta Mission
description: Self-reliant pulses mission across 100 districts.

name: New Agricultural Marketing Infrastructure (AMI) sub-scheme of ISAM
description: Develop agri marketing infrastructure under ISAM.
benefits: Subsidy for cold storages, grading units

name: Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyay Yojana
description: Direct cash benefits to farmers of paddy/maize/sugarcane, pulses & oilseeds.

name: SVAMITVA Yojana
description: Map rural property and issue property-cards to farmers.
